input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0px; background: #FFFFFF;

div.span: The Mission of the Wayne Trace Local School District is to prioritize the philosophy of One District-One-Mission-One Vision. Wayne Trace is committed to educational excellence that will help all students achieve at their highest level and to graduate with the knowledge, skills, and attitudes to become thinking, productive citizens in a changing global society, this is accomplished through a system which supports community values and integrates community, technology, and educational resources delivered in a safe environment by a caring staff.

video.data-setup: { "autoplay": false, "controls": true, "muted": false, "loop": true, "loadingSpinner": true, "fluid": true, "techOrder": ["html5","flash"], "ga": {"eventsToTrack": ["start"]} }

source.p: To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

span.div: Welcome to the Wayne Trace Local School District, where our mission is to prioritize the philosophy of One District - One Mission - One Vision. ...

div.span: Parents enrolling children into Wayne Trace Local School District need to complete the Enrollment Packet and schedule an appointment by calling 419-399-4100.

Wayne Trace Central Office4915 US 127
Haviland, OH 45851
Get Directions
Phone: (419) 622-5171
Fax: (419) 622 3037

This District provides an equal educational opportunity for all students. Any person who believes that she or he has been discriminated against on the basis of his/her race, color, disability, religion, gender, or national origin while at school or a school activity should immediately contact the School District's Compliance Officer(s).
© 2020. Wayne Trace Local School District. All Rights Reserved.
